column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday January 5 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The roadway is shut down at the northern split due to a semi fire.
Traffic is being diverted to I-64W toward Midway until further notice.  Expected duration until noon.
Expect increased congestion on I-64W up to Exit 69 (Georgetown).  Motorists may use this exit to turn around to access I-64E toward I-75S, but expect long delays in the process.
